channel.title: "pvpownage" new server!
channel.description:
About PvP Ownage
Hello, I'm Admin Logic the co-owner of PvP Ownage. PvP Ownage was once widely known in 2010 for being a fun 525 server in which you could spawn any item you wanted and go out and pk in PvP Zone. Unfortunately we suffered flood attacks almost every other hour and had no option but to turn the server off. It's been three years now and we are ready to start new with a 317! PvP Ownage has only been online for about 3 weeks now which was spent making major changes and planning the future of PvP Ownage. Here are a few changes and added features done by the owner (Soxcalibeast):
Home Moved to Edgeville New Shops added New Starter Working Bank Pin added! Overloads added! Working Bounty Hunter added! Godwars Added! Cool Custom items added!WITH CUSTOM ITEM SHOPS FOR REGULAR PLAYERS Donator/Admin/Staffzone added! High Scores added! PK Points added! First PvP Ownage Event added! There's much more.. this was just off the top of my head!
Other Features Working PvP Armor Working Godsword Specials Working Dragon Claws! Working Spirit Shields Working Dark Bow SLAYER HELMS Hundreds of Customs! Assault with fighter torso/rune defender rewards etc.. CASTLE WARS COMING SOON TORMENTED DEMONS COMING SOON WITH DRAGON CLAW DROPS AVATARS AND BARRELCHESTS COMING SOON NEW PRAYERS WITH TURMOIL COMING SOON NEW DONATOR ISLAND COMING SOON CHANGES TO BARROWS MINIGAME COMING SOON WORKING PEST CONTROL
NO LAG Good Economy Wide variety of monsters + more coming Great Donator Benefits Very friendly Staff VERY OPEN TO SUGGESTIONS AND MUCH MORE...
SERVER STATUS: BETA TESTING
FORUMS LINK: http://pvpownage.your-talk.com/ FORUMS LINK: http://pvpownage.your-talk.com/ FORUMS LINK: http://pvpownage.your-talk.com/ FORUMS LINK: http://pvpownage.your-talk.com/
Soxcalibeast and I are working very hard to develop this server to be one of the best. New features are being added everyday, many of which came from the suggestions of our players! We look forward to what the players have to say about the server, whether it be negative or positive feedback, we are open to what you have to say. Come join us on PvP Ownage!
for pictures! http://pvpownage.your-talk.com/t18-new-pictures

item.title: "pvpownage" new server!
item.dc:creator: @soxcalibeast soxcalibeast
item.description:
@soxcalibeast wrote:

About PvP Ownage

Hello, I’m Admin Logic the co-owner of PvP Ownage.
PvP Ownage was once widely known in 2010 for being a fun 525 server in which you could spawn any item you wanted and go out and pk in PvP Zone. Unfortunately we suffered flood attacks almost every other hour and had no option but to turn the server off. It’s been three years now and we are ready to start new with a 317! PvP Ownage has only been online for about 3 weeks now which was spent making major changes and planning the future of PvP Ownage. Here are a few changes and added features done by the owner (Soxcalibeast):

Home Moved to Edgeville
New Shops added
New Starter
Working Bank Pin added!
Overloads added!
Working Bounty Hunter added!
Godwars Added!
Cool Custom items added!WITH CUSTOM ITEM SHOPS FOR REGULAR PLAYERS
Donator/Admin/Staffzone added!
High Scores added!
PK Points added!
First PvP Ownage Event added!
There’s much more… this was just off the top of my head!

Other Features
Working PvP Armor
Working Godsword Specials
Working Dragon Claws!
Working Spirit Shields
Working Dark Bow
SLAYER HELMS
Hundreds of Customs!
Assault with fighter torso/rune defender rewards etc…
CASTLE WARS COMING SOON
TORMENTED DEMONS COMING SOON WITH DRAGON CLAW DROPS
AVATARS AND BARRELCHESTS COMING SOON
NEW PRAYERS WITH TURMOIL COMING SOON
NEW DONATOR ISLAND COMING SOON
CHANGES TO BARROWS MINIGAME COMING SOON
WORKING PEST CONTROL

NO LAG
Good Economy
Wide variety of monsters + more coming
Great Donator Benefits
Very friendly Staff
VERY OPEN TO SUGGESTIONS
AND MUCH MORE…

SERVER STATUS: BETA TESTING

FORUMS LINK: http://pvpownage.your-talk.com/

FORUMS LINK: http://pvpownage.your-talk.com/
FORUMS LINK: http://pvpownage.your-talk.com/

Soxcalibeast and I are working very hard to develop this server to be one of the best. New features are being added everyday, many of which came from the suggestions of our players! We look forward to what the players have to say about the server, whether it be negative or positive feedback, we are open to what you have to say. Come join us on PvP Ownage!
